Metadata.description: Blog personal sobre Inteligencia Artificial, Algoritmos y LaTeX.

HomePage.title: Welcome to my AI Research Blog

Footer.about_page: About this page and its content

About.title: About Me
About.content: I am Eric Lucero González, a PhD student specializing in Artificial Intelligence. This blog serves as a platform to share my research, insights, and developments in the field of AI.
About.license_terms: All content on this blog is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License (CC BY-NC 4.0). You are free to share and adapt the material as long as you provide appropriate credit, do not use it for commercial purposes, and indicate if changes were made.
About.page_content: This blog is built using Next.js and Next-Intl for internationalization. It features posts written in both English and Spanish, catering to a diverse audience interested in AI research.
